about_the_game:
In the not-so-distant future, society battles the insidious "Pandora Virus," an initially benign flu evolving into a nightmarish contagion. Governments crumble, and institutions fall, leaving survivors to navigate a world overrun by the undead. You step into the shoes of a survivor, battling for survival and a chance at rebuilding in a world teetering on the brink of collapse.

As your journey unfolds, you'll confront challenges, seek fellow survivors, and forge alliances – or face the dangers posed by desperate enemies. The narrative takes unexpected turns, and the truth behind the virus emerges, revealing a sinister origin. This wasn't a natural disaster; it was a weapon conceived in secrecy, wielded by a powerful organization with a nefarious agenda.

Hints of the impending apocalypse echo through ancient texts like the Book of Revelation, with signs manifesting as the world succumbs to the virus, and the dead reclaim the earth. Your mission becomes clear: unearth the means to halt the virus, to restore humanity's foothold on the precipice of extinction.

Yet, with each step forward, you confront the haunting reality that the virus may have spread too far. The player grapples with heart-wrenching choices in a world where hope flickers like a dying flame. Can a cure be found, or is humanity destined to confront its final chapter?

This game is a visceral blend of survival, adventure, and mystery, interwoven with the chilling elements of horror. Brace yourself for a journey that will keep you on the edge of your seat, where every moment could be a step closer to salvation or the brink of the end of days.



Innovative 3D Menu Experience:
Immerse yourself in a revolutionary gaming interface with our unparalleled 3D menu map. As the camera gracefully glides around, providing a cinematic journey through our game's universe, your journey begins even before the first undead encounter. This unique menu experience sets the stage for an unforgettable gaming adventure, promising a fresh perspective on navigation and interaction like never seen before.

Arsenal of Weapons:
Equip yourself with a diverse array of weapons, each boasting unique characteristics that demand strategic considerations in the face of the relentless undead hordes. Stay tuned for the imminent Weapon Customization update, promising to elevate your arsenal and intensify your survival strategies.

Zombie Variety:
Confront an assortment of zombie types, each endowed with distinctive abilities, strengths, and vulnerabilities, injecting depth and unpredictability into every encounter. Stay on the lookout for upcoming updates, promising to expand and diversify the undead horde, amplifying the challenge and ensuring that no two encounters are ever the same.

HellMode and SlayerMode Challenges:
Plunge into the abyss with "HellMode," an electrifying difficulty setting that elevates the fear factor, presenting an uncompromising challenge even for the most seasoned players. Brace yourself for an unparalleled test of skill and resilience, setting the stage for the forthcoming "SlayerMode" challenges, where only the boldest survivors will thrive.

Engaging Multiplayer:
The multiplayer mode, while currently pitting players against AI bots, sets the stage for future updates that will introduce even more thrilling and dynamic encounters. Playing with friends and more will come soon.

Immersive Single-Player Campaign:
Embark on a narrative-driven journey, where the fate of the protagonist is entwined with the secrets of the virus, unraveling a compelling story of survival, betrayal, and redemption.

Dynamic Environments:
Explore ever-changing landscapes, from desolate city streets to frightening tight spaces, providing a rich and immersive backdrop for your adventures.

Day/Night Cycle:
Experience the intensity of a dynamic day/night cycle, affecting visibility, and overall gameplay tone, providing a realistic and immersive environment.

Realistic Sound Design:
HellFull - The Last Hope features haunting sound compositions, adding a unique layer of intensity to your survival journey. Step into the post-apocalyptic world with an immersive sound design meticulously crafted through intricate blueprint coding. Every creak, groan, and distant howl is purposefully designed to intensify the atmospheric horror, creating an unparalleled gaming experience.



Powered by Unreal Engine 4:/b]
Crafted with the cutting-edge capabilities of Unreal Engine 4, renowned as the pinnacle of game development engines. Experience the epitome of immersive visuals, seamless gameplay, and unparalleled performance that this industry-leading engine brings to HellFull - The Last Hope.



Developer's Journey:
Born from a dream nurtured over 15 years, HellFull - The Last Hope is the culmination of a 7-year odyssey. Niël, the sole developer, embarked on a relentless learning process — from the fundamentals to mastering game development intricacies, understanding the nuances of Unreal Engine 4, to finally publishing the debut game on Steam. This journey is not just about a game; it's a testament to dedication, passion, and the pursuit of a dream realized.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: HellFull - The Last Hope

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 8.1 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD® A8 3870 3,6 Ghz or Intel® Core ™ i3 2100 3.1Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 128 MB, Shader model 2.0. ATI X800, NVidia 6600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD® FX 8150 3.6 GHz or Intel® Core™ i7 2600 3.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible

short_description: Crafted over 7 years by sole developer Niël, HellFull - The Last Hope is just beginning! Featuring 5 modes, Course of Slayers, immersive Singleplayer, action-packed Multiplayer, Hellmode's wave survival, and a future open-world! It offers something for everyone! The journey will keep evolving!
